December 23rd, 1922.
Dr. H.R. Carter
U.S. Public Health Service
Washington D.C.
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
I am forwarding you attached my report of
the campaign in Vera Cruz and in the Second Yellow Fever
Zone in Mexico, covering the two years I have been in
charge.

This report was submitted to the Departmento
de Salubridad General de la Republica at the termination
of my two years service. There may be something of inter-
est in it.

I hope you and yours had a very Merry Christ-
mas and that you will all enjoy a Prosperous and Happy
New Year.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, Bert W. Caldwell c/o First National Bank
Effingham Illinois.
